title: WTB: T206 Addie Joss PSA 2 or 3
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Addie Joss PSA 2 or 3
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy a T206 Addie Joss in PSA 2 or 3. Portrait or pitching pose will do. Let me know what you have and thanks for looking!
Jeff

Hi Jeff,
If SGC works for you, I have a nice duplicate 40 in the pitching pose available for $120 (includes delivery and PayPal fees).  E-mail sent as well.
Thanks,
--S

[IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-CWGEOMkyoic/TPAWSO4LneI/AAAAAAAAFkM/-im8Cz3S7WY/s640/T206%252520Joss%252520%252528pitching%252529%252520-%252520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-rsPWS5SjWDo/TPAWSchuWmI/AAAAAAAABB4/Wy5MSaxLaWs/s640/T206%252520Joss%252520%252528pitching%252529%252520-%252520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for the help guys. Picked up a nice PSA 3 Joss (pitching).
Jeff
It was a pleasure doing business with Jeff.

Fellow collectors, I had a great transaction with Michael here on the B/S/T. You can buy with confidence from this great seller... so get off your wallets!
Jeff
